item.title: The Red Flags of Hiring
item.description: If you apply to a position, it's important you write an email that feels like a human wrote it and says what you’ve done in as a few words as possible. If you’re looking for a position at a startup, an agency, or something in the online industry, this list of hiring red flags may help you avoid ending up in the immediate ‘no’ pile.
